anya-e0906n:3_0: Pucchā – paṭhamamahāsaṁgītikāle āvuso dhammasaṁgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā
anya-e0906n:3_1: porāṇasaṁgītikārā paṭhamaṁ vinayapiṭakaṁ saṁgāyitvā suttantapiṭake ca dīghamajjhimasaṁyuttaaṅguttarasaṁkhāte
anya-e0906n:3_2: cattāro mahānikāye saṁgāyitvā tadanantaraṁ kiṁ nāma pāvacanaṁ saṁgāyiṁsu.
anya-e0906n:4_0: Vissajjanā – paṭhamamahāsaṁgītikāle bhante dhammasaṁgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā
anya-e0906n:4_1: porāṇasaṁgītikārā paṭhamaṁ vinayapiṭakaṁ saṁgāyitvā suttantapiṭake ca dīghamajjhimasaṁyuttaaṅguttarasaṁkhāte
anya-e0906n:4_2: cattāro nikāye saṁgāyitvā tadanantaraṁ abhidhammapiṭakaṁ nāma pāvacanaṁ saṁgāyiṁsu.
anya-e0906n:5_0: Pucchā – imissampi āvuso chaṭṭhasaṁgītiyaṁ sakalañceva vinayapiṭakaṁ saṁgītaṁ, te
anya-e0906n:5_1: ca cattāro mahānikāyā. Kālo dāni āvuso sampatto abhidhammapiṭakaṁ saṁgāyituṁ, tasmāhaṁ
anya-e0906n:5_2: taṁ tattha pucchitabbāni pucchissāmi. Abhidhammo nāmesa āvuso kenaṭṭhena abhidhammoti vuccati.
anya-e0906n:6: Vissajjanā – dhammātireka dhammavisesaṭṭhena bhante abhidhammoti vuccati.
anya-e0906n:7: Pucchā – so panesa āvuso abhidhammo kena kattha kadā ca adhigato.
anya-e0906n:8: Vissajjanā – so kho bhante abhidhammo sabbaññubuddhena mahābodhimaṇḍamūle vesākhapuṇṇamiyaṁ yathābhūtaṁ adhigato.
anya-e0906n:9: Pucchā – kattha panesa āvuso abhidhammo bhagavatā kadā ca vicito.
anya-e0906n:10: Vissajjanā – so kho bhante abhidhammo bhagavatā mahābodhimaṇḍe ratanagharasattāhe vicito.
anya-e0906n:11: Pucchā – kattha panesa āvuso abhidhammo bhagavatā kadā kassatthāya ca desito.
anya-e0906n:12_0: Vissajjanā – so kho bhante abhidhammo bhagavatā devesu tāvatiṁsesu pāricchattakamūlamhi
anya-e0906n:12_1: paṇḍukambalasilāyaṁ abhisambodhito sattame vasse mātaraṁ pamukhaṁ katvā dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi
anya-e0906n:12_2: āgamma sannisinnānaṁ devatānaṁ caturoghanittharaṇatthāya anto vassaṁ desito.
anya-e0906n:13: Pucchā – kenesa āvuso abhidhammo paṭhamaṁ manussaloke patiggahito, kassa ca puna tena desito.
anya-e0906n:14_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmatā bhante sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā esa abhidhammo paṭhamaṁ
anya-e0906n:14_1: manussaloke patiggahito, teneva bhante āyasmatā sāriputtattherena attano saddhivihārikānaṁ
anya-e0906n:16: Vissajjanā – sekhā ca bhante puthujjanā kalyāṇakā ca sikkhanti.
anya-e0906n:20: Vissajjanā – yesaṁ bhante vattati, te dhārenti.
anya-e0906n:22: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0906n:26: Pucchā – so panesa āvuso abhidhammo dhammasaṅgaṇivibhaṅgādipakaraṇaparicchedavasena sattavidho. Tesu paṭhamaṁ bhagavatā kataraṁ pakaraṇaṁ desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:27: Vissajjanā – paṭhamaṁ bhante dhammasaṅgaṇipakaraṇaṁ bhagavatā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:28: Pucchā – dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṁ āvuso atthi mātikā, atthi padabhājanīyaṁ. Tesu mātikaṁ nikkhipantena bhagavatā kataṁ nikkhittā.
anya-e0906n:29_0: Vissajjanā – mātikaṁ bhante nikkhipantena bhagavatā ‘‘kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā
anya-e0906n:29_1: abyākatā dhammā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā
anya-e0906n:29_2: dhammā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā. Vipākā dhammā vipākadhammadhammā
anya-e0906n:29_3: nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā’’ti evamādinā dvāvīsatiyā tikānaṁ vasena. ‘‘Hetū dhammā
anya-e0906n:29_4: na hetū dhammā. Sahetukā dhammā ahetukā dhammā.
anya-e0906n:30_0: Hetusampayuttā dhammā hetuvippayuttā dhammā. Hetū ceva dhammā sahetukā ca sahetukā
anya-e0906n:30_1: ceva dhammā na ca hetū. Hetū ceva dhammā hetusampayuttā ca hetusampayuttā ceva dhammā
anya-e0906n:30_2: na ca hetū. Na hetū kho pana dhammā sahetukāpi ahetukāpī’’ti evamādinā dukasatānañca
anya-e0906n:32_0: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṁ padabhājanīye cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā
anya-e0906n:32_1: dhammātipadassa atthaṁ vibhajantena bhagavatā kathaṁ kāmāvacarakusalaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:33_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante dhammasaṅgaṇipakaraṇe cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā
anya-e0906n:33_1: dhammāti padassa atthaṁ vibhajantena bhagavatā ‘‘katame dhammā kusalā. Yasmiṁ samaye
anya-e0906n:33_2: kāmāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ hoti somanassasahagataṁ ñāṇasampayuttaṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0906n:33_3: vā saddārammaṇaṁ vā gandhārammaṇaṁ vā rasārammaṇaṁ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṁ vā dhammārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0906n:33_4: vā yaṁ yaṁ vā panārabbha. Tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti vedanā hoti saññā hoti cetanā
anya-e0906n:33_5: hoti cittaṁ hoti vitakko hoti vicāro hoti pīti hoti sukhaṁ hoti cittassekaggatā hotī’’ti
anya-e0906n:33_6: evamādinā kāmāvacarakusalaṁ tīhi mahāvārehi vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:35_0: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷiyaṁ cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā dhammāti
anya-e0906n:35_1: padassa atthaṁ vibhajantena bhagavatā kathaṁ rūpāvacarakusalañca arūpāvacarakusalañca
anya-e0906n:36_0: Vissajjanā – rūpāvacarakusalañca arūpāvacarakusalañca bhante ‘‘katame dhammā kusalā.
anya-e0906n:36_1: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi
anya-e0906n:36_2: savitakkaṁ savitakkaṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇa’’nti
anya-e0906n:38: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷiyaṁ cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā dhammāti padassa atthaṁ vibhajantena bhagavatā kathaṁ lokuttarakusalaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:39_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṁ cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā dhammāti
anya-e0906n:39_1: padassa atthaṁ vibhajantena bhagavatā ‘‘katame dhammā kusalā. Yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ
anya-e0906n:39_2: jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā
anya-e0906n:39_3: vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiñña’’nti
anya-e0906n:39_4: evamādinā bhagavatā lokuttarakusalaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:41: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso akusalā dhammāti mātikāpadassa atthaṁ vibhajantena bhagavatā kathaṁ akusalaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:42_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante akusalā dhammāti mātikāpadassa atthaṁ vibhajantena bhagavatā
anya-e0906n:42_1: ‘‘katame dhammā akusalā. Yasmiṁ samaye akusalaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ hoti somanassasahagataṁ
anya-e0906n:42_2: diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ vā saddhārammaṇaṁ vā gandhārammaṇaṁ vā rasārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0906n:42_3: vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṁ vā dhammārammaṇaṁ vā yaṁ yaṁ vā panārabbha. Tasmiṁ samaye phasso
anya-e0906n:42_4: hoti vedanā hoti saññā hoti cetanā hoti cittaṁ hotī’’ti evamādinā akusalaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:44_0: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷiyaṁ cittuppādakaṇḍarūpakaṇḍesu abyākatā
anya-e0906n:44_1: dhammāti mātikāpadassa atthaṁ vibhajantena bhagavatā kathaṁ abyākatā dhammā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:45_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṁ abyākatā dhammāti padassa atthaṁ
anya-e0906n:45_1: vibhajantena bhagavatā ‘‘katame dhammā abyākatā. Yasmiṁ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa
anya-e0906n:45_2: kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ uppannaṁ hoti upekkhāsahagataṁ
anya-e0906n:45_3: rūpārammaṇaṁ. Tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti vedanā hoti saññā hoti cetanā hoti cittaṁ
anya-e0906n:45_4: hotī’’ti evamādinā ca cittuppādakaṇḍe, rūpakaṇḍe ca ‘‘katame dhammā abyākatā. Kusalākusalānaṁ
anya-e0906n:45_5: dhammānaṁ vipākā kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā arūpāvacarā apariyāpannā vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho
anya-e0906n:45_6: saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho. Ye ca dhammā kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca
anya-e0906n:45_7: kammavipākā. Sabbañca rūpaṁ asaṅkhatā ca dhātu. Ime dhammā abyākatā’’ti evamādinā
anya-e0906n:45_8: ca abyākatā dhammā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:47: Pucchā – sattasu āvuso abhidhammappakaraṇesu vibhaṅgappakaraṇe bhagavatā kati vibhaṅgā desitā.
anya-e0906n:48_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu dutiye vibhaṅgappakaraṇe
anya-e0906n:48_1: khandhavibhaṅgo āyatanavibhaṅgo dhātuvibhaṅgo saccavibhaṅgo indriyavibhaṅgo paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅgo
anya-e0906n:48_4: khuddakavatthuvibhaṅgo dhammahadayavibhaṅgoti bhagavatā aṭṭhārasa vibhaṅgā desitā.
anya-e0906n:50: Pucchā – tesu āvuso aṭṭhārasasu vibhaṅgesu paṭhame khandhavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ khandhā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:51_0: Vissajjanā – tesu bhante aṭṭhārasasu vibhaṅgesu paṭhame khandhavibhaṅge ‘‘pañcakkhandhā
anya-e0906n:51_1: rūpakkhandho vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho. Tattha
anya-e0906n:51_2: katamo rūpakkhandho, yaṁkiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā
anya-e0906n:51_3: vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā, tadekajjhaṁ abhisaññūhitvā
anya-e0906n:51_5: tīhi mahānayehi bhagavatā khandhā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:53: Pucchā – dutiye pana āvuso āyatanavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ āyatanāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:54_0: Vissajjanā – dutiye bhante āyatanavibhaṅge ‘‘dvādasāyatanāni cakkhāyatanaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ
anya-e0906n:54_1: sotāyatanaṁ saddāyatanaṁ ghānāyatanaṁ gandhāyatanaṁ jivhāyatanaṁ rasāyatanaṁ kāyāyatanaṁ
anya-e0906n:54_2: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ manāyatanaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ. Cakkhuṁ aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ anattā vipariṇāmadhammaṁ,
anya-e0906n:54_3: rūpā aniccā dukkhā anattā vipariṇāmadhammā’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā suttantabhājanīyaabhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0906n:56: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe tatiye dhātuvibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ dhātuyo vitthārena vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:57_0: Vissajjanā – tatiye bhante dhātuvibhaṅge ‘‘cha dhātuyo pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu
anya-e0906n:57_2: tīhi mahānayehi bhagavatā dhātuyo vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:59: Pucchā – catutthe pana āvuso saccavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ saccāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:60_0: Vissajjanā – catutthe bhante saccavibhaṅge ‘‘cattāri ariyasaccāni dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ,
anya-e0906n:60_1: dukkhasamudayaṁ ariyasaccaṁ, dukkhanirodhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā
anya-e0906n:60_2: ariyasaccaṁ. Tattha katamaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ, jātipi dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, maraṇampi
anya-e0906n:60_3: dukkhaṁ, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsāpi dukkhā, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi
anya-e0906n:60_4: vippayogo dukkho, yampicchaṁ na labhati, tampi dukkhaṁ, saṁkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā
anya-e0906n:60_6: tīhi mahānayehi bhagavatā saccāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:62: Pucchā – pañcame pana āvuso indriyavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ indriyāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:63_0: Vissajjanā – pañcame pana bhante indriyavibhaṅge ‘‘bāvīsatindriyāni cakkhundriyaṁ
anya-e0906n:63_1: sotindriyaṁ ghānindriyaṁ jivhindriyaṁ kāyindriyaṁ manindriyaṁ…pe… aññātāvindriya’’nti
anya-e0906n:65: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe chaṭṭhe paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ paṭiccasamuppādo vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:68: Pucchā – sattame pana āvuso satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ satipaṭṭhānā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:69_0: Vissajjanā – sattame bhante satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅge ‘‘cattāro satipaṭṭhānā idha bhikkhu
anya-e0906n:69_1: ajjhattaṁ kāye kāyānupassī viharati, bahiddhā kāye kāyānupassī viharati, ajjhattabahiddhā
anya-e0906n:69_2: kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassa’’nti
anya-e0906n:71: Pucchā – aṭṭhame pana āvuso sammappadhānavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ sammappadhānā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:72_0: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhame bhante sammappadhānavibhaṅge ‘‘cattāro sammappadhānā idha bhikkhu
anya-e0906n:72_1: anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ
anya-e0906n:72_2: ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya
anya-e0906n:72_3: chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati, anuppannānaṁ
anya-e0906n:72_4: kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti
anya-e0906n:72_5: padahati, uppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya
anya-e0906n:72_6: bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahatī’’ti
anya-e0906n:72_7: evamādinā bhagavatā sammappadhānā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:74: Pucchā – navame pana āvuso iddhipādavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ iddhipādā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:75_0: Vissajjanā – navame bhante iddhipādavibhaṅge ‘‘cattāro iddhipādā idha bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ
anya-e0906n:75_2: evamādinā tīhi mahānayehi bhagavatā iddhipādā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:77: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe dasame bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ bojjhaṅgā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:78_0: Vissajjanā – dasame bhante bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge ‘‘satta bojjhaṅgā satisambojjhaṅgo dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo
anya-e0906n:78_2: Tattha katamo satisambojjhaṅgo, idha bhikkhu satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato
anya-e0906n:78_3: cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā hoti anussaritā, ayaṁ vuccati satisambojjhaṅgo’’ti
anya-e0906n:80: Pucchā – ekādasame pana āvuso maggaṅgavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ maggaṅgā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:81_0: Vissajjanā – ekādasame bhante maggaṅgavibhaṅge ‘‘ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. Seyyathidaṁ,
anya-e0906n:81_1: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati
anya-e0906n:81_3: tīhi mahānayehi maggaṅgā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:83: Pucchā – dvādasamo pana āvuso jhānavibhaṅgo bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:84_0: Vissajjanā – dvādasamo bhante jhānavibhaṅgo ‘‘idha bhikkhu pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto
anya-e0906n:84_1: viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu
anya-e0906n:84_2: indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū pubbarattāpararattaṁ jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto’’ti
anya-e0906n:86: Pucchā – terasame pana āvuso appamaññāvibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ appamaññāyo vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:87_0: Vissajjanā – terasame bhante appamaññāvibhaṅge ‘‘catasso appamaññāyo idha bhikkhu
anya-e0906n:87_1: mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṁ. Tathā tatiyaṁ.
anya-e0906n:87_2: Tathā catutthaṁ. Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena
anya-e0906n:87_3: cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharatī’’ti
anya-e0906n:89: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe cuddasame sikkhāpadavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ sikkhāpadāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:90_0: Vissajjanā – cuddasame bhante sikkhāpadavibhaṅge ‘‘pañca sikkhāpadāni pāṇātipātā
anya-e0906n:90_1: veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṁ, adinnādānā veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṁ, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī
anya-e0906n:90_2: sikkhāpadaṁ, musāvādā veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṁ, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇī
anya-e0906n:90_3: sikkhāpadaṁ. Tattha katamaṁ pāṇātipātā veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṁ, yasmiṁ samaye kāmāvacaraṁ
anya-e0906n:90_4: kusalaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ hoti somanassasahagataṁ ñāṇasampayuttaṁ pāṇātipātā viramantassā’’ti
anya-e0906n:92: Pucchā – pannarasame pana āvuso paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ paṭisambhidāyo vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:93_0: Vissajjanā – pannarasame bhante paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge ‘‘catasso paṭisambhidā atthapaṭisambhidā
anya-e0906n:93_1: dhammapaṭisambhidā niruttipaṭisambhidā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā. Atthe ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidā,
anya-e0906n:93_2: dhamme ñāṇaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā, tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṁ niruttipaṭisambhidā,
anya-e0906n:93_3: ñāṇesu ñāṇaṁ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā catasso paṭisambhidāyo
anya-e0906n:95: Pucchā – soḷasame pana āvuso ñāṇavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ ñāṇāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:96_0: Vissajjanā – soḷasame bhante ñāṇavibhaṅge ‘‘ekavidhena ñāṇavatthu pañcaviññāṇā na
anya-e0906n:96_1: hetū, ahetukā, hetuvippayuttā, sappaccayā , saṅkhatā, arūpā, lokiyā, sāsavā’’ti evamādinā
anya-e0906n:96_2: ekakato paṭṭhāya yāva dasakā bhagavatā ñāṇāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:98: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe sattarasamo khuddakavatthuvibhaṅgo bhagavatā kathaṁ desito.
anya-e0906n:99_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante dutiye vibhaṅgappakaraṇe sattarasamo khuddakavatthuvibhaṅgo
anya-e0906n:99_1: ‘‘jātimado, gottamado, ārogyamado, yobbanamado, jīvitamado’’ti evamādinā ekakato
anya-e0906n:99_2: paṭṭhāya yāva aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritaṁ bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:101: Pucchā – tattha āvuso aṭṭhārasamo dhammahadayavibhaṅgo bhagavatā kathaṁ vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:102_0: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhārasamo bhante dhammahadayavibhaṅgo ‘‘kati khandhā, kati āyatanāni,
anya-e0906n:102_1: kati dhātuyo, kati saccāni, kati indriyāni, kati hetū, kati āhārā, kati phassā, kati
anya-e0906n:102_2: vedanā, kati saññā, kati cetanā, kati cittāni. Pañcakkhandhā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa
anya-e0906n:102_3: dhātuyo, cattāri saccāni, bāvīsatindriyāni, nava hetū, cattāro āhārā, satta phassā,
anya-e0906n:102_4: satta vedanā, satta saññā, satta cetanā, satta cittānī’’ti evamādinā sabbasaṅgāhakādīhi
anya-e0906n:102_5: dasahi vārehi bhagavatā vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:103: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā uppādakakammaāyuppamāṇavāro vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:104_0: Vissajjanā – dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā kattha upapajjanti.
anya-e0906n:104_1: Dānaṁ datvā, sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā appekacce khattiyamahāsālānaṁ
anya-e0906n:104_2: sahabyataṁ upapajjanti, appekacce brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṁ, appekacce gahapatimahāsālānaṁ,
anya-e0906n:104_3: appekacce cātumahārājikānaṁ devānaṁ, appekacce tāvatiṁsānaṁ devānaṁ, appekacce yāmānaṁ
anya-e0906n:104_4: devānaṁ, appekacce tusitānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjantīti evamādinā bhante tattha
anya-e0906n:108_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā aṭṭhārasahi buddhadhammehi samannāgatena abhidhamme aṭṭhārasahi
anya-e0906n:108_1: vibhaṅgehi paṭimaṇḍitaṁ dutiyaṁ vibhaṅgappakaraṇaṁ desetvā tadanantaraṁ dhātukathaṁ
anya-e0906n:108_2: nāma tatiyaṁ pakaraṇaṁ kathaṁ vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:109_0: Vissajjanā – tatiyaṁ bhante dhātukathaṁ nāma abhidhammapiṭakaṁ ‘‘saṅgaho asaṅgaho,
anya-e0906n:109_1: saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṁ, asaṅgahitena saṅgahitaṁ, saṅgahitena saṅgahitaṁ, asaṅgahitena
anya-e0906n:109_2: asaṅgahitaṁ. Sampayogo vippayogo, sampayuttena vippayuttaṁ, vippayuttena sampayuttaṁ,
anya-e0906n:109_3: sampayuttena sampayuttaṁ, vippayuttena vippayuttaṁ. Saṅgahitena sampayuttaṁ vippayuttaṁ,
anya-e0906n:109_4: sampayuttena saṅgahitaṁ asaṅgahitaṁ, asaṅgahitena sampayuttaṁ vippayuttaṁ, vippayuttena
anya-e0906n:109_5: saṅgahitaṁ asaṅgahita’’nti evamādinā pañca mātikāyo paṭhamaṁ nikkhipitvā saṅgahāsaṅgahādīhi
anya-e0906n:109_6: cuddasahi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:111: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā sabbadhātukusalena abhidhammapiṭake tatiyaṁ dhātukathāpakaraṇaṁ desetvā tadanantaraṁ catutthaṁ puggalapaññattippakaraṇaṁ kathaṁ vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:112_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante catutthaṁ puggalapaññattippakaraṇaṁ ‘‘cha paññattiyo
anya-e0906n:112_1: khandhapaññatti āyatanapaññatti dhātupaññatti saccapaññatti indriyapaññatti puggalapaññatti.
anya-e0906n:112_2: Kittāvatā khandhānaṁ khandhapaññatti, yāvatā pañcakkhandhā, rūpakkhandho vedanākkhandho
anya-e0906n:112_3: saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho. Ettāvatā khandhānaṁ khandhapaññattī’’ti
anya-e0906n:114_1: catutthaṁ puggalapaññattippakaraṇaṁ desetvā tadanantaraṁ pañcamaṁ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṁ kathaṁ desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:115_0: Vissajjanā – sabbaparamatthapaññattidhammakusalena bhante bhagavatā loke aggapuggalena
anya-e0906n:115_1: abhidhammapiṭake catutthaṁ puggalapaññattippakaraṇaṁ desetvā tadanantaraṁ kathāvatthudesanāya
anya-e0906n:115_2: vāre sampatte ‘‘anāgate mama sāvako moggaliputtatissatthero nāma uppannaṁ sāsanamalaṁ
anya-e0906n:115_3: sodhetvā tatiyasaṅgītiṁ karonto bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe nisinno sakavāde pañca suttasatāni
anya-e0906n:115_4: paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṁ samodhānetvā, imaṁ pakaraṇaṁ bhājessatī’’ti tassokāsaṁ
anya-e0906n:115_5: karontena puggalavāre aṭṭhamukhā vādayuttiṁ ādiṁ katvā sabbakathāmaggesu asampuṇṇabhāṇavāratthāya
anya-e0906n:115_6: tantiyā mātikā nikkhepamattena pañcamaṁ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṁ saṁkhepato desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:116: Pucchā – adhunā pākaṭaṁ panāvuso vitthāraṁ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṁ kadā kena kattha kathañca vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:117_0: Vissajjanā – taṁ kho bhante bhagavato nayamukhaṁ nissāya āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena
anya-e0906n:117_1: tatiyasaṁgītikāle pāṭaliputte asokārāme saṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassānaṁ samāgame bhagavatā
anya-e0906n:117_2: dinnanayavasena tathāgatena ṭhapitamātikaṁ vibhajantena sakavāde pañcasuttasatāni
anya-e0906n:117_3: paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṁ āharitvā idaṁ paravādamathanaṁ adhunā pākaṭaṁ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṁ
anya-e0906n:118: Pucchā – kati āvuso tattha kathāyo tena āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:119: Vissajjanā – tattha bhante vācanāmaggato dve ca satāni sattavīsati ca kathāyo āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:121: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha paṭhamā puggalakathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:122_0: Vissajjanā – puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti, āmantā. Yo saccikaṭṭho
anya-e0906n:122_1: paramattho, tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti, na hevaṁ vattabbe.
anya-e0906n:122_2: Ājānāhi niggahaṁ hañci puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena, tena vata re
anya-e0906n:122_3: vattabbe ‘‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho, tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti.
anya-e0906n:122_4: Yaṁ tattha vadesi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’, no
anya-e0906n:122_5: ca vattabbe ‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho, tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti,
anya-e0906n:122_6: micchāti evamādinā bhante tattha paṭhamā puggalakathā pañca bhāṇavāramattāya tantiyā
anya-e0906n:124: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso kathāvatthuppakaraṇe dutiyavagge dutiyā aññāṇakathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:125_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe dutiyavagge dutiyā
anya-e0906n:125_1: aññāṇakathā ‘‘atthi arahato aññāṇanti, āmantā. Atthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo
anya-e0906n:125_2: avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānīvaraṇanti, na hevaṁ vattabbe.
anya-e0906n:125_3: Natthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ
anya-e0906n:125_4: avijjānivaraṇanti, āmantā. Hañci natthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo
anya-e0906n:125_5: avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānīvaraṇaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe ‘‘atthi
anya-e0906n:125_6: arahato aññāṇa’’nti evamādinā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā bhāsitā.
anya-e0906n:127: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe tatiyavagge ekādasamā asaññakathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:128_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe tatiyavagge ekādasamā
anya-e0906n:128_1: asaññakathā ‘‘asaññasattesu saññā atthīti, āmantā. Saññābhavo saññāgati saññāsattāvāso
anya-e0906n:128_2: saññāsaṁsāro saññāyoni saññattabhāvapaṭilābhoti, na hevaṁ vattabbe’’ti evamādinā
anya-e0906n:130: Saññābhavo saññāgati saññāsattāvāso saññāsaṁsāro saññāyoni saññattabhāvapaṭilābho.
anya-e0906n:132: Nanu asaññabhavo asaññagati asaññasattāvāso asaññasaṁsāro asaññayoni asaññattabhāvapaṭilābho.
anya-e0906n:133: Hañci asaññabhavo asaññagati asaññasattāvāso asaññasaṁsāro asaññayoni asaññattabhāvapaṭilābho, no ca vata re vattabbe asaññasattesu saññā atthi.
anya-e0906n:135: Pañcavokārabhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni attabhāvapaṭilābho.
anya-e0906n:136: Nanu ekavokārabhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni attabhāvapaṭilābho.
anya-e0906n:137: Hañci ekavokārabhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni attabhāvapaṭilābho, no ca vata re vattabbe asaññasattesu saññā atthi.
anya-e0906n:140: Pucchā – chaṭṭhavagge pana āvuso aṭṭhamā pathavīdhātu sanidassanātiādikathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:141_0: Vissajjanā – chaṭṭhavagge bhante aṭṭhamā pathavīdhātu sanidassanātiādikathā ‘‘pathavīdhātu
anya-e0906n:141_1: sanidassanāti āmantā. Rūpaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ rūpadhātu nīlaṁ pītakaṁ lohitakaṁ odātaṁ
anya-e0906n:141_2: cakkhuviññeyyaṁ cakkhusmiṁ paṭihaññati cakkhussa āpāthaṁ āgacchatīti, na hevaṁ vattabbe’’ti
anya-e0906n:141_3: evamādinā āyasmatā mahāmoggali puttatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:144: Tena hi na vattabbaṁ cakkhuñca paṭicca pathavīdhātuñca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ.
anya-e0906n:146: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe aṭṭhamavagge dutiyā antarābhavakathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:147_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe aṭṭhamavagge dutiyā
anya-e0906n:147_1: antarābhavakathā ‘‘atthi antarābhavoti, āmantā. Kāmabhavoti, na hevaṁ vattabbe…pe…
anya-e0906n:147_2: atthi antarābhavoti, āmantā. Rūpabhavoti, na hevaṁ vattabbe…pe… atthi antarābhavoti,
anya-e0906n:147_3: āmantā. Arūpabhavoti, na hevaṁ vattabbe’’ti evamādinā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena
anya-e0906n:151: Kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare atthi antarābhavo.
anya-e0906n:153: Rūpabhavassa ca arūpabhavassa ca antare atthi antarābhavo.
anya-e0906n:154: Kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavo.
anya-e0906n:155: Hañci kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavo, no ca vata re vattabbe atthi antarābhavo.
anya-e0906n:157: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe cuddasamavagge dutiyā saḷāyatanuppattikathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:158_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe cuddasamevagge
anya-e0906n:158_1: dutiyā saḷāyatanuppattikathā ‘‘saḷāyatanaṁ apubbaṁ acarimaṁ mātukucchismiṁ saṇṭhātīti,
anya-e0906n:158_2: āmantā. Sabbaṅgapaccaṅgī ahīnindriyo mātukucchismiṁ okkamatīti, na hevaṁ vattabbe’’ti
anya-e0906n:158_3: evamādinā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:163: Upapattesiyena cittena hatthā saṇṭhanti, pādā saṇṭhanti, sīsaṁ saṇṭhāti, kaṇṇo saṇṭhāti, nāsikā saṇṭhāti, mukhaṁ saṇṭhāti, dantā saṇṭhanti.
anya-e0906n:165_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā yamakapāṭihīrāvasāne tāvatiṁsadevalokaṁ gantvā dasasahassalokadhātūhi
anya-e0906n:165_1: āgamma sannisinnānaṁ devānaṁ abhidhammadesanaṁ desentena paṭhamaṁ abhidhammapiṭake
anya-e0906n:165_2: pañcappakaraṇāni desetvā tadanantaraṁ chaṭṭhaṁ yamakappakaraṇaṁ desentena kati yamakappakaraṇāni
anya-e0906n:166_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavatā bhante yamassa visayātītena yamakapāṭihīrāvasāne tāvatiṁsadevalokaṁ
anya-e0906n:166_1: gantvā tattha dasasahassalokadhātūhi āgamma sannisinnānaṁ devatānaṁ abhidhammapiṭakaṁ
anya-e0906n:166_2: desentena abhidhammapiṭake pūrimāni pañcappakaraṇāni desetvā tadanantaraṁ chaṭṭhaṁ
anya-e0906n:166_3: yamakappakaraṇaṁ mūlayamakaṁ khandhayamakaṁ āyatanayamakaṁ dhātuyamakaṁ saccayamakaṁ
anya-e0906n:166_4: saṅkhārayamakaṁ anusayayamakaṁ cittayamakaṁ dhammayamakaṁ indriyayamakanti dasa yamakappakaraṇāni
anya-e0906n:168: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā paṭhamaṁ mūlayamakaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:169_0: Vissajjanā – ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlā. Ye vā pana kusalamūlā, sabbe
anya-e0906n:169_1: te dhammā kusalā. Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlena ekamūlā. Ye vā pana
anya-e0906n:169_2: kusalamūlena ekamūlā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā. Ye keci kusalamūlena ekamūlā dhammā,
anya-e0906n:169_3: sabbe te dhammā kusalamūlena aññamaññamūlā. Ye vā pana kusalamūlena aññamaññamūlā,
anya-e0906n:169_4: sabbe te dhammā kusalāti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā paṭhamaṁ mūlayamakaṁ bāvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:169_5: ca tikehi dukasatena ca vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:170: Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlā.
anya-e0906n:171: Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlāti, tīṇeva kusalamūlāni avasesā kusalā dhammā, na kusalamūlā, ye vā pana kusalamūlā, sabbe te dhammā kusalāti, āmantā –
anya-e0906n:173: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dutiyaṁ khandhayamakaṁ bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:174_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dutiyaṁ khandhayamakaṁ
anya-e0906n:174_2: Rūpaṁ rūpakkhandho, rūpakkhandho rūpaṁ. Vedanā vedanākkhandho, vedanākkhandho vedanā.
anya-e0906n:174_3: Saññā saññākkhandho, saññākkhandho saññā. Saṅkhārā saṅkhārakkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho
anya-e0906n:174_4: saṅkhārā. Viññāṇaṁ viññāṇakkhandho, viññāṇakkhandho viññāṇa’’nti evamādinā bhagavatā
anya-e0906n:176: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe tatiyaṁ āyatanayamakaṁ bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:177_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe tatiyaṁ āyatanayamakaṁ
anya-e0906n:177_2: rūpāyatanaṁ saddāyatanaṁ gandhāyatanaṁ rasāyatanaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ manāyatanaṁ
anya-e0906n:177_3: dhammāyatanaṁ. Cakkhu cakkhāyatanaṁ, cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhu. Sotaṁ sotāyatanaṁ, sotāyatanaṁ
anya-e0906n:179: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu catutthaṁ dhātuyamakaṁ bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:180_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu catutthaṁ
anya-e0906n:180_1: dhātuyamakaṁ ‘‘aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo – cakkhudhātu sotadhātu ghānadhātu jivhādhātu kāyadhātu
anya-e0906n:180_2: rūpadhātu saddadhātu gandhadhātu rasadhātu phoṭṭhabbadhātu cakkhuviññāṇadhātu sotaviññāṇadhātu
anya-e0906n:180_3: ghānaviññāṇadhātu jivhāviññāṇadhātu kāyaviññāṇadhātu manodhātu manoviññāṇadhātu dhammadhātū’’ti
anya-e0906n:182: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu pañcamaṁ saccayamakaṁ bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:183_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu pañcamaṁ
anya-e0906n:183_1: saccayamakaṁ ‘‘cattāri saccāni – dukkhasaccaṁ samudayasaccaṁ nirodhasaccaṁ maggasaccaṁ.
anya-e0906n:183_2: Dukkhaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ, dukkhasaccaṁ dukkhaṁ. Samudayo samudayasaccaṁ, samudayasaccaṁ
anya-e0906n:183_3: samudayo. Nirodho nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodhasaccaṁ nirodho. Maggo maggasaccaṁ, maggasaccaṁ
anya-e0906n:183_4: maggo’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:185: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu chaṭṭhaṁ saṅkhārayamakaṁ bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:186_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu chaṭṭhaṁ
anya-e0906n:186_1: saṅkhārayamakaṁ ‘‘tayo saṅkhārā – kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro , cittasaṅkhāro. Assāsapassāsā
anya-e0906n:186_2: kāyasaṅkhāro, vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhārā, saññā ca vedanā ca cittasaṅkhāro ṭhapetvā
anya-e0906n:186_3: vitakkavicāre sabbepi cittasampayuttakā dhammā cittasaṅkhāro’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā
anya-e0906n:188: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu sattamaṁ anusayayamakaṁ bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:189_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu sattamaṁ
anya-e0906n:189_1: anusayayamakaṁ ‘‘satta anusayā – kāmarāgānusayo paṭighānusayo mānānusayo diṭṭhānusayo
anya-e0906n:189_2: vicikicchānusayo bhavarāgānusayo avijjānusayo. Kattha kāmarāgānusayo anuseti, kāmadhātuyā
anya-e0906n:189_3: dvīsu vedanāsu ettha kāmarāgānusayo anusetī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā uppattiṭṭhānavāra
anya-e0906n:189_4: anusayavāra sānusayavāra pajahanavāra pariññāvāra pahīnavāra uppajjanavāra dhātuvārasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0906n:191: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu aṭṭhamaṁ cittayamakaṁ bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:192_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu aṭṭhamaṁ
anya-e0906n:192_1: cittayamakaṁ ‘‘yassa cittaṁ uppajjati na nirujjhati, tassa cittaṁ nirujjhissati na
anya-e0906n:192_2: uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṁ nirujjhissati na uppajjissati, tassa cittaṁ uppajjati
anya-e0906n:192_4: saṅkhātehi tīhi mahānayeti vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:194: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu navamaṁ dhammayamakaṁ bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:195_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu navamaṁ
anya-e0906n:195_1: dhammayamakaṁ ‘‘kusalā kusalā dhammā, kusalā dhammā kusalā. Akusalā akusalā dhammā,
anya-e0906n:195_2: akusalā dhammā akusalā. Abyākatā abyākatā dhammā, abyākatā dhammā abyākatā’’ti evamādinā
anya-e0906n:195_3: bhagavatā paṇṇattivārapavattivārapariññāvārasaṅkhātehi tīhi mahāvārehi vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:197: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu dasamaṁ indriyayamakaṁ bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:198_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu dasamaṁ
anya-e0906n:198_2: kāyindriyaṁ itthindriyaṁ purisindriyaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ manindriyaṁ sukhindriyaṁ dukkhindriyaṁ
anya-e0906n:198_3: somanassindriyaṁ domanassindriyaṁ upekkhindriyaṁ saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ
anya-e0906n:198_5: bhagavatā paṇṇattivāra pavattivāra pariññāvārasaṅkhātehi tīhi mahāvārehi vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:200: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso indriyayamake tīsu mahāvāresu pavattivāre uppādaatītavāro bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:201_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante indriyayamake tīsu mahāvāresu pavattivāre uppādaatītavāro
anya-e0906n:201_1: ‘‘yassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjitta, tassa sotindriyaṁ, ghānindriyaṁ, jivhindriyaṁ,
anya-e0906n:201_2: kāyindriyaṁ, itthindriyaṁ, purisindriyaṁ, jīvitindriyaṁ, somanassindriyaṁ, upekkhindriyaṁ,
anya-e0906n:201_3: saddhindriyaṁ, vīriyindriyaṁ, satindriyaṁ, samādhindriyaṁ, paññindriyaṁ, manindriyaṁ,
anya-e0906n:201_4: uppajjitthāti, āmantā. Yassa vā pana manindriyaṁ uppajjittha, tassa cakkhundriyaṁ
anya-e0906n:201_5: uppajjitthāti, āmantā’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:203: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso indriyayamake tīsu mahāvāresu pavattivāre uppādaanāgatavāro bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:204_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante indriyayamake tīsu mahāvāresu pavattivāre uppādaanāgatavāro
anya-e0906n:204_1: ‘‘yassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjissati, tassa sotindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti, āmantā. Yassa
anya-e0906n:204_2: vā pana sotindriyaṁ uppajjissati, tassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjissatī’’ti āmantā. Yassa
anya-e0906n:204_3: cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjissati, tassa ghānindriyaṁ, jivhindriyaṁ, kāyindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti,
anya-e0906n:204_4: ye rūpāvacaraṁ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjissati, no
anya-e0906n:204_5: ca tesaṁ kāyindriyaṁ uppajjissati, itaresaṁ tesaṁ cakkhundriyañca uppajjissati kāyindriyañca
anya-e0906n:204_6: uppajjissatī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:205_0: Yassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjissati, tassa itthindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti. Ye rūpāvacaraṁ
anya-e0906n:205_1: upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, ye ca purisā eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā
anya-e0906n:205_2: parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ itthindriyaṁ uppajjissati,
anya-e0906n:205_3: itaresaṁ tesaṁ cakkhundriyañca uppajjissati itthindriyañca uppajjissati.
anya-e0906n:206_0: Yassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjissati, tassa purisindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti, ye rūpāvacaraṁ
anya-e0906n:206_1: upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, yā ca itthiyo eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā
anya-e0906n:206_2: parinibbāyissanti, tesaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ purisindriyaṁ uppajjissati.
anya-e0906n:206_3: Itaresaṁ tesaṁ cakkhundriyañca uppajjissati purisindriyañca uppajjissati.
anya-e0906n:207_0: Yassa itthindriyaṁ uppajjissati, tassa purisindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti, yā itthiyo eteneva
anya-e0906n:207_1: bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti, tāsaṁ itthindriyaṁ uppajjissati,
anya-e0906n:207_2: no ca tāsaṁ purisindriyaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ itthindriyañca uppajjissati
anya-e0906n:209_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena abhisambuddhakālato
anya-e0906n:209_1: sattamavasse manussaloke yamakapāṭihīraṁ dassetvā tadanantaraṁ tāvatiṁsadevalokaṁ
anya-e0906n:209_2: gantvā tattha paṇḍukambalasilāyaṁ sannisīditvā dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi āgamma sannisinnānaṁ
anya-e0906n:209_3: devānaṁ abhidhammadesanaṁ desentena yāva yamakappakaraṇā purimāni cha abhidhammappakaraṇāni
anya-e0906n:210_0: Vissajjanā – tena bhante bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena abhisambuddhakālato
anya-e0906n:210_1: sattame vasse manussaloke sāvatthiyaṁ kaṇḍambamūle yamakapāṭihīraṁ dassetvā tadanantaraṁ
anya-e0906n:210_2: tāvatiṁsadevalokaṁ gantvā tattha paṇḍukambalasilāyaṁ sannipatitvā dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi
anya-e0906n:210_3: āgamma sannisinnānaṁ devānaṁ abhidhammadesanaṁ desentena purimāni cha abhidhammappakaraṇāni
anya-e0906n:210_4: desetvā tadanantaraṁ anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānaṁ nāma sattamaṁ mahāpakaraṇaṁ desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:211: Pucchā – taṁ panetaṁ āvuso paṭṭhānaṁ kenaṭṭhena paṭṭhānanti vuccati.
anya-e0906n:212: Vissajjanā – taṁ panetaṁ bhante paṭṭhānaṁ nānappakārapaccayaṭṭhena vibhajanaṭṭhena paṭṭhitaṭṭhena ca paṭṭhānanti vuccati.
anya-e0906n:213: Pucchā – tañcāvuso bhagavatā paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇaṁ desentena katihi vārehi vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:214: Vissajjanā – taṁ kho bhante bhagavatā paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇaṁ desentena mātikānikkhepavārasaṅkhāto paccayuddeso paccayaniddeso mahāvāreti dvīhi paricchedavārehi vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:215: Pucchā – tesu āvuso vāresu paṭhame mātikānikkhepavāre paccayuddesavāro bhagavatā kathaṁ desito.
anya-e0906n:216_0: Vissajjanā – tesu bhante dvīsu paricchedavāresu paṭhame mātikānikkhepavāre paccayuddese
anya-e0906n:216_1: hetupaccayo ārammaṇapaccayo adhipatipaccayo anantarapaccayo samanantarapaccayo sahajātapaccayo
anya-e0906n:216_2: aññamaññapaccayo nissayapaccayo…pe… avigatapaccayo’’ti. Evaṁ kho bhante bhagavatā vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:217: Pucchā – tadanantaraṁ pana āvuso paccayaniddesavāro bhagavatā kathaṁ vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:218_0: Vissajjanā – tadanantaraṁ pana bhante paccayaniddesavāro ‘‘hetupaccayoti – hetū hetusampayuttakānaṁ
anya-e0906n:218_1: dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇapaccayoti – rūpārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0906n:218_2: cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Saddhāyatanaṁ
anya-e0906n:218_5: paccayo. Rūpāyatanaṁ saddāyatanaṁ gandhāyatanaṁ rasāyatanaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ manodhātuyā
anya-e0906n:218_6: taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Sabbe dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā
anya-e0906n:218_7: taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Yaṁ yaṁ dhammaṁ ārabbha
anya-e0906n:218_8: ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā, te te dhammā tesaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ
anya-e0906n:218_9: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:219: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake sattame mahāpakaraṇe dvīsu padhānavāresu dutiye mahāvāre kati ṭhānāni vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:220_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:220_1: mahāpakaraṇe dvīsu padhānaparicchedavāresu dutiye mahāvāre dhammānulome cha paṭṭhānāni,
anya-e0906n:220_2: tathā dhammapaccanīye dhammānulomapaccanīye dhammapaccanīyānulometi catuvīsati paṭṭhānāni
anya-e0906n:222: Pucchā – tesupi āvuso catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatitikā bhagavatā katihi vārehi vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:223_0: Vissajjanā – tesu bhante catuvīsatiyā mahāpaṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:223_1: dvāvīsatitikā paṭiccavāro sahajātavāro paccayavāro nissayavāro saṁsaṭṭhavāro sampayuttavāro
anya-e0906n:223_2: pañhāvāroti sattahi sattahi vārehi vibhajitvā bhagavatā desitā.
anya-e0906n:225: Pucchā – tesu cāvuso dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu paṭhamo paṭiccamahāvāro bhagavatā kathaṁ vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:226_0: Vissajjanā – tesu bhante dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu
anya-e0906n:226_1: paṭhamo paṭiccamahāvāro siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:226_2: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā. Siyā kusalaṁ
anya-e0906n:226_3: dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā. Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
anya-e0906n:226_4: kusalā ca abyākatā ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṁ hetupaccayā. Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
anya-e0906n:226_5: akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṁ hetupaccayā. Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
anya-e0906n:226_6: kusalo ca akusalo ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṁ hetupaccayā. Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
anya-e0906n:226_7: kusalo ca akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṁ hetupaccayā’’ti evamādinā pucchāvārena
anya-e0906n:226_8: ca. ‘‘Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
anya-e0906n:226_9: paṭicca tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
anya-e0906n:226_10: Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusale khandhe paṭicca
anya-e0906n:226_11: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ. Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti
anya-e0906n:226_12: hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
anya-e0906n:226_13: tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe paṭicca dve
anya-e0906n:226_14: khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpa’’nti evamādinā vissajjanā vissajjanāvārena ca. ‘‘Hetuyā
anya-e0906n:226_15: nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe
anya-e0906n:226_16: tīṇi, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme nava, vipāke
anya-e0906n:226_17: ekaṁ, āhāre jhāne indriye magge nava, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte atthiyā nava, natthiyā
anya-e0906n:226_18: vigate tīṇi, avigate navā’’ti evamādinā saṅkhyāvārena ca bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:227: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:229_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:229_1: paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike
anya-e0906n:229_2: sattasu mahāvāresu dutiyo sahajātavāro kathaṁ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:230_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante anantanayapaṭṭhāne mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:230_1: paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike
anya-e0906n:230_2: sattasu mahāvāresu dutiyo sahajātāvāro ‘‘kusalaṁ dhammaṁ sahajāto kusalo dhammo uppajjati
anya-e0906n:230_3: hetupaccayā, kusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ sahajātā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe sahajāto eko
anya-e0906n:230_4: khandho, dve khandhe sahajātā dve khandhā. Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ sahajāto abyākato dhammo
anya-e0906n:230_5: uppajjati hetupaccayā, kusale khandhe sahajātaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ. Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
anya-e0906n:230_6: sahajāto kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā, kusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
anya-e0906n:230_7: sahajātā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, tayo khandhe sahajāto eko khandho
anya-e0906n:230_8: cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpa’’nti evamādinā vissajjanāvārena
anya-e0906n:230_9: ca. Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare tīṇī’’ti evamādinā
anya-e0906n:230_10: saṅkhyāvārena ca vācanāmaggato dvīhi vārehi paṭimaṇḍitvā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:232_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:232_1: paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike
anya-e0906n:232_2: sattasu mahāvāresu tatiyo paccayavāro kathaṁ vibhajitvā vitthārena desito.
anya-e0906n:233_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:233_1: mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne bāvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:233_2: tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu tatiyo paccayavāro ‘‘siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
anya-e0906n:233_3: paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā, siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā akusalo
anya-e0906n:233_4: dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā, siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjeyya
anya-e0906n:233_5: hetupaccayā’’ti evamādinā pucchāvārena ca. ‘‘Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo dhammo
anya-e0906n:233_6: uppajjati hetupaccayā, kusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paccayā
anya-e0906n:233_7: eko khandho, dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā’’ti evamādinā vissajjanāvārena ca. ‘‘Hetuyā
anya-e0906n:233_8: sattarasa, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare samanantare satta, sahajāte
anya-e0906n:233_9: sattarasa. Aññamaññe sattā’’ti evamādinā saṅkhyāvārena ca. Paccayānuloma paccaya
anya-e0906n:233_10: paccaniya paccayānuloma paccanīya paccaya paccanīyānulomasaṅkhātehi catūhi nayehi
anya-e0906n:234: Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paccayā eko khandho, dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā- ….
anya-e0906n:236_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake sattasu mahāpakaraṇesu
anya-e0906n:236_1: sattame paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:236_2: dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattamo pañhāvāro kathaṁ
anya-e0906n:237_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:237_1: mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:237_2: tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattamo pañhāvāro ‘‘siyā kusalo dhammo
anya-e0906n:237_3: kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Siyā kusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa
anya-e0906n:237_4: hetupaccayena paccayo. Siyā kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo’’ti
anya-e0906n:237_5: evamādinā pucchāvārena ca. ‘‘Kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:237_6: kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa
anya-e0906n:237_7: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo, kusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena
anya-e0906n:237_8: paccayo’’ti evamādinā vissajjanāvārena ca ‘‘hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā
anya-e0906n:237_9: dasa, anantare samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa,
anya-e0906n:237_10: upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṁ. Āhāre
anya-e0906n:237_11: indriye jhāne magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā
anya-e0906n:237_12: vigate satta, avigate terasā’’ti evamādinā saṅkhyāvārena ca paccayānulomapaccayapaccanīyapaccayānulomapaccanīyapaccayapaccanīyānulomasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0906n:237_13: catūhi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:238_0: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo, kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
anya-e0906n:238_1: khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena
anya-e0906n:238_2: paccayo, kusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo
anya-e0906n:238_3: kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo, kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
anya-e0906n:241_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake sattasu pakaraṇesu
anya-e0906n:241_1: sattame paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:241_2: dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattame pañhāvāre pucchāvissajjanāsaṅkhyāvārasaṅkhātesu
anya-e0906n:241_3: tīsu vāresu vissajjanāvāre hetupaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṁ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:242_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:242_1: mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:242_2: tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattame pañhāvāre paccayānulomapaccayapaccanīya
anya-e0906n:242_3: paccayānuloma paccanīyapaccaya paccayanīyānulomasaṅkhātesu catūsu nayesu paṭhame
anya-e0906n:242_5: vissajjanāvāre hetupaccayavibhaṅgo ‘‘kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena
anya-e0906n:242_6: paccayo, kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo
anya-e0906n:242_7: abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ
anya-e0906n:242_8: hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena
anya-e0906n:242_9: paccayo, kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena
anya-e0906n:242_10: paccayo’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:243_0: … ‘‘Kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo, kusalā hetū sampayattakānaṁ
anya-e0906n:243_1: khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena
anya-e0906n:243_2: paccayo, kusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo
anya-e0906n:243_3: kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo, kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
anya-e0906n:245_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame
anya-e0906n:245_1: paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:245_2: tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattame pañhāvāre catūsu nayesu paṭhame
anya-e0906n:245_3: paccayānulomanaye pucchāvissajjanāsaṅkhyāvārasaṅkhātesu tīsu vāresu dutiye vissajjanāvāre
anya-e0906n:245_4: hetupaccayavibhaṅgādīsu catuvīsatiyā vibhaṅgesu dutiyo ārammaṇapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṁ
anya-e0906n:246_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:246_1: mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:246_2: tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattame pañhāvāre catūsu nayesu paṭhame
anya-e0906n:246_3: paccayānulomanaye tīsu ca vāresu dutiye vibhaṅgavāre hetupaccayavibhaṅgādīsu catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:246_4: vibhaṅgesu dutiyo ārammaṇapaccayavibhaṅgo ‘‘kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
anya-e0906n:246_5: paccayo, dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe
anya-e0906n:246_6: suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ paccavekkhati, sekkhā gotrabhuṁ
anya-e0906n:246_7: paccavekkhanti, vodānaṁ paccavekkhanti, sekkhā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti,
anya-e0906n:246_8: sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā kusalaṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, cetopariyañāṇena
anya-e0906n:246_11: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Kusalā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa,
anya-e0906n:248_0: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:248_1: paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhānesu bāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike
anya-e0906n:248_2: sattasu mahāvāresu sattame pañhāvāre catūsu nayesu paṭhame paccayānulomanaye pucchāvissajjanāsaṅkhyāsaṅkhātesu
anya-e0906n:248_3: tīsu vāresu dutiye vissajjanāsaṅkhāte vibhaṅgavāre hetupaccayavibhaṅgādīsu catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:248_4: vibhaṅgesu tatiyo adhipatipaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṁ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:249_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:249_1: mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne bāvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:249_2: tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattame pañhāvāre catūsu nayesu paṭhame
anya-e0906n:249_3: paccayānulomanaye pucchāvissajjanāsaṅkhyāsaṅkhātesu tīsu vāresu dutiye vissajjanāsaṅkhāte
anya-e0906n:249_4: vibhaṅgavāre hetupaccayavibhaṅgādīsu catuvīsatiyā vibhaṅgesu tatiyo adhipatipaccayavibhaṅgo
anya-e0906n:249_5: ‘‘kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
anya-e0906n:249_6: Ārammaṇādhipati–dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā
anya-e0906n:249_7: paccavekkhati. Pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ
anya-e0906n:249_8: garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, sekkhā gotrabhuṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṁ garuṁ
anya-e0906n:249_9: katvā paccavekkhanti, sekkhā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
anya-e0906n:251: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… catuttho anantarapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṁ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:252_1: dhammo kusalassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo, purimā purimā kusalā khandhā
anya-e0906n:252_2: pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kusalānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo. Anulomaṁ
anya-e0906n:252_3: gotrabhussa, anulomaṁ vodānassa, gotrabhu maggassa, vodānaṁ maggassa anantarapaccayena
anya-e0906n:252_4: paccayo’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:254: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… chaṭṭho sahajātapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṁ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:255_1: dhammo kusalassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo, kusalo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ
anya-e0906n:255_2: khandhānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo, tayo khandhā ekassa khandhassa sahajātapaccayena
anya-e0906n:255_3: paccayo, dve dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa
anya-e0906n:255_4: dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo, kusalā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena
anya-e0906n:255_5: paccayo’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:257: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… navamo upanissayapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṁ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:258_1: dhammo kusalassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo,
anya-e0906n:258_2: pakatūpanissayo. Ārammaṇūpanissayo–dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā
anya-e0906n:259_0: Pakatūpanissayo – saddhaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti sīlaṁ samādiyati uposathakammaṁ karoti,
anya-e0906n:259_1: jhānaṁ uppādeti, vipassanaṁ uppādeti, maggaṁ uppādeti, abhiññaṁ uppādeti, samāpattiṁ
anya-e0906n:259_2: uppādetī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:261: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… dasamo purejātapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṁ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:262_1: dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
anya-e0906n:262_2: Ārammaṇapurejātaṁ–arahā cakkhuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati. Ghānaṁ, jivhaṁ,
anya-e0906n:262_3: kāyaṁ, rūpe, sadde, gandhe, rase, phoṭṭhabbe, vatthuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato
anya-e0906n:262_4: vipassati. Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ
anya-e0906n:262_5: cakkhuviññāṇassa, saddāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇassa, gandhāyatanaṁ ghānaviññāṇassa, rasāyatanaṁ
anya-e0906n:262_6: jivhāviññāṇassa, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. Vatthupurejātaṁ–cakkhāyatanaṁ
anya-e0906n:262_7: cakkhuviññāṇassa, sotāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇassa, ghānāyatanaṁ ghānaviññāṇassa, jivhāyatanaṁ
anya-e0906n:262_8: jivhāviññāṇassa, kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthu vipākābyākatānaṁ kriyābyākatānaṁ
anya-e0906n:262_9: khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:264: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… terasamo kammapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṁ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:265_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante…pe… terasamo kammapaccayavibhaṅgo ‘‘kusalo dhammo
anya-e0906n:265_1: kusalassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo, kusalā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ
anya-e0906n:265_2: kammapaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:265_3: Sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. Sahajātā–kusalā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena
anya-e0906n:265_4: paccayo. Nānākkhaṇikā–kusalā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena
anya-e0906n:265_5: paccayo. Kusalo dhammo kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:265_6: Kusalā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena
anya-e0906n:265_7: paccayo’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:267: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… pannarasamo āhārapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṁ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:268_1: dhammo kusalassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. Kusalā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ
anya-e0906n:268_2: āhārapaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:268_3: Kusalā āhārā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā
anya-e0906n:270: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… soḷasamo indriyapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṁ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:271_1: dhammo kusalassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo, kusalo indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ
anya-e0906n:271_2: khandhānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena
anya-e0906n:271_3: paccayo, kusalā indriyā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo’’ti evamādinā
anya-e0906n:273: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… pucchāvissajjanāsaṅkhyāvārasaṅkhātesu tīsu vāresu tatiyo saṅkhyāvāro kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:274_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante…pe… tatiyo saṅkhyāvāro ‘‘hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe
anya-e0906n:274_1: nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantara samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi,
anya-e0906n:274_2: nissaye terasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi , kamme satta,
anya-e0906n:274_3: vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca,
anya-e0906n:274_4: atthiyā terasa, natthiyā vigate satta, avigate terasā’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:275: Hetu sahajāta nissaya atthi avigatanti satta, hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya atthi avigatanti tīṇi, hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya sampayutta atthi avigatanti tīṇi …
anya-e0906n:277: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… paṭhamaṁ kusalattikaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā tadanantaraṁ avasesā vedanāttikādayo ekavīsatitikā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:278_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante…pe… paṭhamaṁ kusalattikaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā
anya-e0906n:278_1: tadanantaraṁ avasesā vedanāttikādayo ekavīsatitikā ‘‘sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ
anya-e0906n:278_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhāya
anya-e0906n:278_3: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho,
anya-e0906n:278_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
anya-e0906n:278_5: dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho’’ti evamādinā ca. Vipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca vipāko
anya-e0906n:278_6: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Vipākaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe
anya-e0906n:278_7: paṭicca eko khandho, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākaṁ ekaṁ
anya-e0906n:278_8: khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho, dve khandhe paṭicca
anya-e0906n:278_9: dve khandhā. Vipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:278_10: vipāke khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṁ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipāke khandhe paṭicca
anya-e0906n:278_11: kaṭattārūpaṁ, khandhe paṭicca vatthū’’ti evamādinā ca ekekasmiṁ tike sattahi sattahi
anya-e0906n:278_12: mahāvārehi ekekasmiñca mahāvāre catūhi catūhi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:280: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… tikapaṭṭhānādīsu chasu antogadhapaṭṭhānādīsu paṭhamaṁ tikapaṭṭhānaṁ desetvā tadanantaraṁ dukapaṭṭhānaṁ kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:281_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante…pe… tikapaṭṭhānādīsu chasu antogadhapaṭṭhānādīsu
anya-e0906n:281_1: paṭhamaṁ tikapaṭṭhānaṁ vibhajitvā tadanantaraṁ dukapaṭṭhānaṁ ‘‘hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
anya-e0906n:281_2: hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā, alobhaṁ paṭicca adoso amoho, adosaṁ paṭicca alobho
anya-e0906n:281_3: amoho, amohaṁ paṭicca alobho adoso. Lobhaṁ paṭicca moho, mohaṁ paṭicca lobho, dosaṁ
anya-e0906n:281_4: paṭicca moho, mohaṁ paṭicca doso’’ti evamādinā ca. Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo
anya-e0906n:281_5: dammo uppajjati hetupaccayā, saraṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe
anya-e0906n:281_6: paṭicca eko khandho, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo
anya-e0906n:281_7: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā, saraṇo khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ. Saraṇaṁ
anya-e0906n:281_8: dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo ca araṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
anya-e0906n:281_9: paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca
anya-e0906n:281_10: rūpaṁ, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpa’’nti evamādinā ca.
anya-e0906n:281_11: Ekekasmiṁ duke sattahi sattahi mahāvārehi ekekasmiñca mahāvāre catūhi catūhi nayehi
anya-e0906n:282: Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā, saraṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho, dve
anya-e0906n:285_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… tikapaṭṭhānādīsu chasu antogadhapaṭṭhānesu paṭhamaṁ tikapaṭṭhānañca
anya-e0906n:285_1: dutiyaṁ dukapaṭṭhānañca vibhajitvā tadavasesāni dukatikapaṭṭhānādīni cattāro paṭṭhānāni
anya-e0906n:286_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante…pe… tikapaṭṭhānādīsu chasu antogadhapaṭṭhānesu
anya-e0906n:286_1: paṭhamaṁ tikapaṭṭhānañca dutiyaṁ dukapaṭṭhānañca vibhajitvā tadavasesā dukatikapaṭṭhānādayo
anya-e0906n:286_2: ‘‘hetuṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ kusalaṁ
anya-e0906n:286_3: dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
anya-e0906n:286_4: paṭicca hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā, nahetuṁ kusalaṁ
anya-e0906n:286_5: dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā, nahetuṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
anya-e0906n:286_6: paṭicca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā, nahetuṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
anya-e0906n:286_7: hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā’’ti evamādinā vitthārato
anya-e0906n:288: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… paṭhamaṁ dhammānulomapaṭṭhānaṁ vibhajitvā tadanantaraṁ dutiyaṁ dhammapaccanīyapaṭṭhānaṁ kathaṁ vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:289_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante…pe… paṭhamaṁ dhammānulomapaṭṭhānaṁ vibhajitvā
anya-e0906n:289_1: tadanantaraṁ dutiyaṁ dhammapaccanīyapaṭṭhānaṁ ‘‘nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
anya-e0906n:289_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalābyākataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca akusalābyākatā
anya-e0906n:289_3: tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ. Tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca
anya-e0906n:289_4: rūpaṁ. Dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ
anya-e0906n:289_5: paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā. Vipākābyākataṁ kiriyābyākataṁ ekaṁ
anya-e0906n:289_6: khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ. Tayo khandhe paṭicca eko
anya-e0906n:289_7: khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ. Dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca
anya-e0906n:289_8: rūpaṁ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati
anya-e0906n:289_9: hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko
anya-e0906n:289_10: khandho, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā’’ti evamādinā tikapaṭṭhānādīhi chahi antogadhapaṭṭhānehi
anya-e0906n:289_11: ekekasmiñca tikapaṭṭhāne dukapaṭṭhāne dukatikapaṭṭhāne tikadukapaṭṭhāne tikatikapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:289_12: dukadukapaṭṭhāne sattahi sattahi mahāvārehi ekekasmiñca mahāvāre catūhi catūhi nayehi
anya-e0906n:291: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… tatiyaṁ dhammānulomapaccanīyapaṭṭhānaṁ kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:292_1: dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusale khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṁ.
anya-e0906n:292_2: Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
anya-e0906n:292_3: paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ. Tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca
anya-e0906n:292_4: rūpaṁ. Dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ. Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
anya-e0906n:292_5: paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo
anya-e0906n:292_6: khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. Kusalaṁ
anya-e0906n:292_7: dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ
anya-e0906n:292_8: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
anya-e0906n:292_9: paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Kusale khandhe paṭicca
anya-e0906n:292_10: cittasamuṭṭhānarūpa’’nti evamādinā bhante tikapaṭṭhānādīhi chahi antogadhapaṭṭhānehi
anya-e0906n:292_11: ekekasmiñca tikapaṭṭhāne dukapaṭṭhāne tikadukapaṭṭhāne dukatikapaṭṭhāne tikatikapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:292_12: dukadukapaṭṭhāne sattahi sattahi mahāvārehi ekekasmiñca mahāvāre catūhi catūhi nayehi
anya-e0906n:294: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… dhammānulomādīsu padhānabhūtesu catūsu paṭṭhānesu catutthaṁ pariyosānabhūtaṁ dhammapaccanīyānulomapaṭṭhānaṁ kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:295_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante…pe… dhammānulomapaṭṭhānādīsu catūsu padhānabhūtesu
anya-e0906n:295_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā, akusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca
anya-e0906n:295_3: tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
anya-e0906n:295_4: Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusale khandhe
anya-e0906n:295_5: paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṁ, vipākābyākataṁ kriyābyākataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca
anya-e0906n:295_6: tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ…pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca
anya-e0906n:295_7: rūpaṁ. Khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
anya-e0906n:295_8: naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā, akusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
anya-e0906n:295_9: tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā’’ti evamādinā tikapaṭṭhānādīhi
anya-e0906n:295_10: cāti antogadhapabhedapaṭṭhānehi ekekasmiñca tikapaṭṭhāne dukapaṭṭhāne dukatikatikadukatikatikadukadukapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:295_11: paṭiccavārādīhi sattahi mahāvārehi ekekasmiñca mahāvāre paccayānulomādīhi catūhi
anya-e0906n:295_12: catūhi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
